text:
I use the log4j xml layout to log the application's messages. I then
drag-and-drop that XML file to chainsaw to view them. I have noticed that
sometimes Chainsaw will not show all message. I have attached a zip file
containing the xml file that gives the failure, along with a screenshot of my
chainsaw. I am using Chainsaw 1.99.99.
creator: wim.deblauwe@gmail.com
wim.deblauwe@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 18879
Example xml file that show the bug and a screenshot

creator: sdeboy@iname.com
text:
While drag & drop has been removed recently since it's probably almost never used, I did load the xml file via the file, "open log4j-xml formatted file" menu and all events were displayed - using the soon-to-be released version of Chainsaw (developer snapshot available at http://people.apache.org/~sdeboy).  

Resolving as fixed.

creator: sdeboy@iname.com
text:
While drag & drop has been removed recently since it's probably almost never used, I did load the xml file via the file, "open log4j-xml formatted file" menu and all events were displayed - using the soon-to-be released version of Chainsaw (developer snapshot available at http://people.apache.org/~sdeboy).  

Resolving as fixed.
